# Case vanilla: Step 1

## Changed Files
- style.css
- style2.css

## Asset Files
- Bundle: bundle.js
- Bundle: style2_css.chunk.CURRENT_HASH.js
- Manifest: main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json, size: 41
- Update: main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js, size: 413
- Update: style2_css.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js, size: 292

## Manifest

### main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json

```json
{"c":["main","style2_css"],"r":[],"m":[]}
```


## Update


### main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js

#### Changed Modules
- ./style.css

#### Changed Runtime Modules
- webpack/runtime/get_full_hash

#### Changed Content
```js
"use strict";
self["webpackHotUpdate"]("main", {
"./style.css": 
/*!*******************!*\
  !*** ./style.css ***!
  \*******************/
(function (module, __unused_webpack_exports, __webpack_require__) {
__webpack_require__.r(module.exports = {});
module.hot.accept();


}),

},function(__webpack_require__) {
// webpack/runtime/get_full_hash
(() => {
__webpack_require__.h = () => ("CURRENT_HASH")
})();

}
);
```



### style2_css.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js

#### Changed Modules
- ./style2.css

#### Changed Runtime Modules


#### Changed Content
```js
"use strict";
self["webpackHotUpdate"]("style2_css", {
"./style2.css": 
/*!********************!*\
  !*** ./style2.css ***!
  \********************/
(function (module, __unused_webpack_exports, __webpack_require__) {
__webpack_require__.r(module.exports = {});
module.hot.accept();


}),

});
```
